system.description:
Years of experience doing your magic with less than an ideal amount of supplies and support has made you resourceful. You gain the following benefits:

  • As long as you are in a settlement with a population of at least 500, you can acquire spell components for a 50% discount through various extralegal or quasi-legal means. 
  • Half your witch levels count as rogue levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0k3qurx2exzg127v]{Shrewd Judgment} feature.
  • Half your rogue levels count as witch levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.dice2o2bv8tsynlt]{Witch's Familiar} feature.
  • Half your rogue levels count as witch levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.f3gqgjl29sdwvt7i]{A Blessing or a Curse} feature. Additionally, you gain an additional benefit based on the option you select when gaining that feature.
    • If you selected @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.8icd91l5z34orf66]{Witch's Blessing}, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.jaj686a9y3t0an5y]{Spiritual Weapon} spell as an additional witch spell and you can choose to have the additional damage done by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.4727pnvz5nwn3h23]{Sneak Attack} feature be radiant damage.
    • If you selected @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.5xuo47w64m4cow6c]{Witch's Curse}, you learn the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.t38ntuyh6iqowo2b]{Flame Blade} spell as an additional witch spell and you can choose to have the additional damage done by your Sneak Attack feature be necrotic damage.
